result.markdown: --- title: "Linear mixed models" --- ### Content ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} |S |Content | PDF | Videos | SAS | R | |:--|:----------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------:| |6b |Clustered data example |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w6b_clustereddata.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/4yXP8B9mYzQ)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_6b_clustereddata.sas)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_6b_clustereddata.R)| |6c |Random effects |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w6c_mixedmodels.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/HLYSs2lxFj8)| | | |6d |Random intercept |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w6d_randomintercept.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/oCuZajuIymk)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_6d_randomintercept.sas)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_6d_randomintercept.R)| ::: ::: ### In class: - Theoretical review of mixed models - marginal versus conditional mean - model equation - REML versus ML (model comparison) - [Workshop: models for CD4 counts](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/files/workshop/MATH60604A-workshop_cd4counts.pdf)
